did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Frank H. T. Rhodes president emeritus papers, 1995-2011.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Subject files, correspondence, working papers, and other material pertaining to President Emeritus Rhodes' alumni, development, and administrative work with Cornell University.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Subject files, correspondence, working papers, and other material pertaining to President Emeritus Rhodes' alumni, development, and administrative work with Cornell University.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Restricted to the permission of the office of origin. Restriction reviews may take up to a month for completion.
